title: "Computer vision researchers use motion to discover objects in videos"
excerpt: "Researchers at Carnegie Mellon University's Robotics Institute have shown that computer vision systems can more easily detect objects in motion—like a car driving down the street or a person walking in a crosswalk—than stationary objects."
